long_description: The Mountain House Apple Crisp offers tasty apples in a cinnamon-spice blend topped with crunchy granola. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Mix contents with water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes and serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Mountain House Apple Crisp offers tasty apples in a cinnamon-spice blend topped with crunchy granola.
